title: (x) "Le Printemps de Septembre" condensed bold serif headline - Plantin Headline Cond {Florian}
content:
Hello!

Any idea about this one?  
By Graphic Thought Facility for a festival in France  
 [http://www.printempsdeseptembre.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017054306/http:/www.printempsdeseptembre.com/ "http://www.printempsdeseptembre.com")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017054306im_/http:/typophile.com/files/printemps_6153.jpg)
author: cicifoo

comments.content:
Hi Ziga,

[Plantin MT Headline](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017054306/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/monotype/plantin_headline_condensed_bold/?sample_text=Toulouse&sample_size=74&acs_p=1&acs_pt=24&acs=1) with a custom ‘e’, Venetian style?  
F

[edit: Yep, [came up before](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017054306/http:/www.typophile.com/node/37364).]
I believe you are correct! Thanks!
